qunit-test

This test is focused on building a simple REST application.

Using pokeapi.co API please list first 37 Pokemons with some additional attributes below this jumbotron.

Please use some external http library that is compatible with es2015 imports (eg. axios)

Additionaly, you can't modify the html file. The application has to be completed in a single js file src/app.js

There is a bootstrap css file already included.



Once the task has been completed, please write at least qunit unit test for your code. Testing stack with samples in tests directory
